duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and develop analytical models and be the face to the data consumers.
Perform data curation to meet the business requirements.
Build batch and streaming data pipelines.
Develop processes for automating, testing, and deploying work.
Identify risks and opportunities of potential logic and data issues within the data environment.
Collaborate effectively with the global team and ensure day-to-day deliverables are met.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree and 5+ years of industry experience in software development, data engineering, business intelligence, data science, or related field with a track record of manipulating, processing, and extracting value from large datasets.
